entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
